mapper.select: select `id`,`project_name`,`build_location`,`project_category`,`project_scale`,`start_time`,`completion_time`, `project_approval`,`completion_acceptance_report`,`record_time`,`declaration_content`,`project_investment`, `project_final_accounts`,`engineering_contract`,`project_settlement`,`operation_effect`,`design_advanced_reasonable`,`has_any_proof`,`passed_safety_assessment`,`has_environmental_assessment`,`construction_unit`,`exploiting_unit`,`design_institute`,`construction_control_unit`,`pro_id`,`task_id`,`apply_id`,`opt_uid`,`created`,`updated` from ass_oil_pro_general_situation where pro_id = #{value} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.delete:
delete from ass_oil_pro_general_situation where id in
#{id}
